title: Mastering Threshold Concepts in Information Literacy: ARCS-Based Intensive Short-Term Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic academic research and information evaluation experience
context.additional_context: Structured around real-world language-related case studies to strengthen learners' job relevance.

learning_goals: Learners can apply academic information credibility assessment criteria with 80% accuracy
Learners can systematically search for at least three information sources relevant to their research topic
Learners can complete a concept map explaining the information production process by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
